item.title: Pokeballs in Super Smash Bros
item.description: Matt Dray Smash! Super Smash Bros (SSB) is a beat â€™em up videogame series featuring characters from various Nintendo franchises and beyond. The series has featured on Nintendo 64 (Super Smash Bros, 1998), Gamecube (SSB Melee, 2001), Wii (SSB Brawl, 2008), Wii U and 3DS (SSB â€˜4â€™, 2014) and an upcoming title for the Switch console. The game is popular enough to have resulted in a series of organised tournaments1.

item.title: TWO DOGS IN TOILET ELDERLY LADY INVOLVED
item.description: Matt Dray TL;DR Animals get stuck in weird places. Oh, and the sf package in R can be used for coordinate reprojection prior to interactive mapping with leaflet. The problem I often work with data that has coordinates; usually a eastings and northings. I need to convert these to latitude and longitude for interactive mapping using the leaflet package in R.

item.title: R Trek: exploring stardates
item.description: Matt Dray Captainâ€™s log ğŸ“– Star date 71750.51. Our mission is to use R statistical software to extract star dates mentioned in the captainâ€™s log from the scripts of Star Trek: The Next Generation and observe their progression over the course of the showâ€™s seven seasons. There appears to be some mismatch in the frequency of digits after the decimal point â€“ could this indicate poor abillity to choose random numbers?
